img.alt: Blue and White coronavirus image graphic with text

a.title: Go to comments for COVID-19 (Coronavirus) Updates

div.p: PUSD will support remote reinforcement learning for all students, including students with disabilities. Find them at goPUSD.com/remote.

a.title: Go to comments for PowerSchool Learning Materials for Students

img.alt: Sign up for PUSD news. Text, email or mobile app.

a.span: Get the latest news by text or email

div.p: Sign up today and stay informed at goPUSD.com/news

a.title: Go to comments for Get the latest news by text or email

img.alt: Food Service Logo with text reading Food Service During School Closure

div.p: Grab n' Go meals are available for children 18 & younger at 7 school sites from 9am - 11am.

a.title: Go to comments for Student Meals

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

div.p: See PUSD's Updated Remote Learning Guidelines and Resources

a.title: Go to comments for Updated Learning Parent Guidelines

img.alt: Image of laptop computer with text reading Online Survey

div.p: PUSD is conducting a series of surveys to gather input from students, parents, staff, and community members as part of the development of the Local Control Accountability Plan (LCAP). Share your thoughts!

a.title: Go to comments for Take the 2020 LCAP Survey!

a.span: New! Armenian Dual Language Immersion Program

div.p: A New Armenian Dual Language Immersion high school program opens in 2020-21. This innovative program will be located at Blair, home to International Baccalaureate programs. Registration begins April 6.

a.title: Go to comments for New! Armenian Dual Language Immersion Program

div.p: More than ever, the PUSD community needs you. Make a BIG difference by counting every child & completing your census form today!

a.title: Go to comments for Census 2020: Pasadena Unified Counts!

div.p: Discover the world with your students with these Virtual Field Trips curated by PUSD's Curriculum, Instruction & Professional Development team.

a.title: Go to comments for Virtual Field Trips
